title: Ep: 021 - Effectively Communicating with Clients as a Photographer
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Robert Rice, Ph.D to discuss the various ways in which photographers can effectively communicate with clients and what sort of verbal (or non-verbal) cues to watch out for.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
content:encoded: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Robert Rice, Ph.D to discuss the various ways in which photographers can effectively communicate with clients and what sort of verbal (or non-verbal) cues to watch out for.
